item.title: Shoes 3 (Policeman 0.r1514) is go!
item.dc:creator: ashbb
item.content:encoded:
We are honored!

- WhyDay blog
- Episode #104 - August 20, 2010

Yes, you can try some new features. :)

Shoes 3,
- come with ruby-1.9.1-p378
- build in bloopsaphone and chipmunk libraries
- has multiple languages manual, English and Japanese
- has some trial methods and options, _snapshot, keyup, keydown, hook and :dash

Enjoy happy Ruby programming,
ashbb
